settings.title: High Standards.Peace of Mind.
settings.content: Our diamonds are first certified by the International Gemological Institute, then only the best are personally selected by our in-house gemologist. We are meticulous so you can shop confidently.

settings.title: The Couple Standard
settings.titlesub: Flawless and colorless to the naked eye.
settings.Button: Flawless and colorless to the naked eye.
settings.content: Our standard optimizes the cut, color and clarity balance, so that your diamond is stunning to the naked eye. Go any higher on the scales and you’ll be overpaying for incremental quality, unless you regularly walk around with a high-powered jeweler’s loupe.

settings.title: A cut above the rest.
settings.content: The ring cut sets the foundation for a quality diamond. Little known fact--cut is the factor most variable amongst diamond brands. Other brands will market an identical excellent cut as "ideal", or "super ideal" depending on the jeweler. We don't use marketing jargon. We only select stones that are cut to maximize the light reflection, bringing forth the best sparkle and radiance.
